subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Cavaliers made more mistakes than the Knicks in the final minutes of a sloppily played fourth quarter, and the Knicks escaped with a victory, ending a two-game losing streak.
snippet: The Cleveland Cavaliers made more mistakes than the Knicks in the final minutes of a sloppily played fourth quarter, and the Knicks escaped with a victory, ending a two-game losing streak.
